title: Intellicharger i2

title: Intellicharger i4

title: Intellicharger Ui2

title: UM4 4-slot
info: Input: DC 5V/2A 9V/2A 18W (MAX) • Automatic and High-Speed Charging • Real-time Information Display • Energy Saving Function • Charges 4 Li-ion Batteries Independently

title: UMS2 2-slot
